import React, { useState } from "react" import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row" import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col" import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card" import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container" import gif from "../../img/bizzdash-_online-video-cutter.com_.gif" import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal" import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button" import projectsList from './../../data/projectList' import "./Projects.css"; const Projects = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = (index) => setShow(index); const projectslist = projectsList console.log("entro") return ( <> { projectslist.map( (elm, index) =>

{elm.name}

{elm.description}

 ) } {projectslist[show].name}
{/* */} ); }; export default Projects;
